article_metadata.description: Holly Fisher, aka "Hobby Lobby Holly," slams people who just want to earn a living wage, God bless 'er.

article_summary:
#StrikeFastFood | |@HollyRFisher "I don't want to try harder to better myself, I just want to cry until someone gives me more."
#StrikeFastFood | |@HollyRFisher Imagine a world where all the folks who cry for more entitlements put as much effort into trying harder as they do whining.
The gist of her tweets: Fast-food workers don’t deserve a wage increase.
#economics #StrikeFastFood | |@HollyRFisher Kinda looking forward to the day when I can order my quarter pounder w/cheese on a machine that doesn't roll its eyes at me.
#HobbyLobby #UniteBlue http://t.co/uAIZji25vS | |Fisher blew up on social media, and media outlets, including Fox News, courted her for interviews.
